__e: The whole Vietnam war was my idea. Not ashamed of it one bit.
My dad was in Vietnam, and if my mom had been there with him, we would've won.
All I'm saying is ifthe cause had been just... I could have gone into Vietnam and done exactlywhatyou did.
I heard soldiers who went to Vietnam liked it later.
And they say if you're gonna get killed in the Nam, it's better to get it in the first few weeks.
When my brother was killed in Vietnam, he decided we wasn't going to lose another son to that particular war.
